text: Service has gone downhill and no longer a mom-and-pop shop after the proprietor retired, and while still owning the shop, now employs workers. Pretty standard transactional experience. Also seen customer quarrel with the shop assistants until police came. The shop also closes early now, so no selling point to go in times of needs. No good reason to support these type of local shops if the service, price and stock are no better than the larger chains or online retailers.

Wandered there by chance while looking for an electrical shop to buy an extension socket.

At first glance it seemed like a random mini mart (or mama shop) that sold basic necessities or groceries. But to my amazement, this mart held so much! Prices were good and could even compete to online shopping prices for electrical stuff.

What I loved the most about this place?

It felt so homely. Customers walking in and out were mostly regulars that came in with huge grins and such positive vibes.

Uncle Yap caught me staring at the electrical section and offered his help. It ended up with demos on how the lights or electricals looked like! He was approachable and knowledgeable, nuff' said!

:)

I want to tap up $10 data for 7 days. The lady give me 1GB only! This is unacceptable. I came back to the store and they tell me that I am the one who do wrong instead the girl write the contact number! Since she load it already they say I can do anything even tho I’m not the one who load it. It’s the girl! . Please make this right! You might lose good customers. This is really unacceptable since I lose 10 dollars for just 1GB!

Very bad service at Cassia crescent Blk34..must open at 10.30am but they open at 11am.. close at 10.30pm but they closed at 10pm.. and some the guys  who there also not so friendly..they see a person they suspect.. why this shop having a Malaysians ppl to work.. no manners at all..so what they offer cheaper then 7-11.. but still come back to square 1.. they dun want to take 5cents also...also money what.. come from Malaysia come here work then go back not claiming ownership here..it's also expensive too beer cheap but another things expensive..buy a shower gel here expensive but U go other places cheaper

Service is very bad. Went to this shop to do printing. The shop owner does not know how to operate the printer and told me it's self-service. Printed a sample to see if it's alright before i proceed to print the rest of my items. Apparently, sample is correct. However, with the same settings (did not click on others), the rest of the print out turn to be in the wrong position. The shop owner told me can't pause/stop and i have to pay for the wrong prints. I felt scammed.
